body.name: SUNNOW Mesh Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support & Flip-up Armrest, Comfort Wide Seat, High-Back Computer Task Chair for Home Office Student
features: 【ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR YOUR BODY】 - All parts are carefully selected. SUNNOW ergonomic chair passed the BIFMA, SGS. Great quality guaranteed! The office desk chairs with adjustable lumbar support, flip-up arms and resilient padded thick seat cushion offer you ultimate sitting experience. Exquisite Design for various workplaces like home, office, conference room and reception room.

【3D-DYNAMIC LUMBAR SUPPORT】- The mesh ergonomic office chair features personalized lumbar support that has 3 different height adjustments. Find the right lumbar height to perfectly fit your body, easing spinal stress and reducing back pain. This is especially crucial for those who sit for extended periods in offices or at home, as it promotes good posture.

【FLIP UP ARMS TO SAVE SPACE】- The well-designed padded flip-up armrests exchange the home office chair to be an armless chair. Easy to store under a desk even if there is only a small space left underneath. Easy to move and save space. Besides, the elegantly curved silhouette can better fit body curve and the high backrest extends to the upper back for greater support.

【UPHOLSTERED SOFT SEAT FOR INFINITE COMFORT】- Featured 2.6 in thickness cushion, the high-density sponge offers super softness with good tactility, providing a comfortable sitting experience whenever you resting and sitting. Besides, it will not take you too much time and effort in daily clean-up and maintenance.

【ADJUSTABLE HEADREST & TILT ROCKING】- The swivel high back desk chair is designed to satisfy your different needs. You can easily adjust the height and angle of the headrest, supporting your neck. Besides, the backrest can be rocked from 90° to 105°, locking at upright position.

【STABLE STRUCTURE & BREATHABLE MESH】- SUNNOW mesh desk chair consists of reinforced gas lift and strong 5-star base, which is sturdy enough to support people up to 280 lbs with 5'1" to 5'9" tall. The mesh fabric keeps your back cool and comfortable by allowing air to flow freely.

【EASY TO INSTALL & 2-YEAR WARRANTY 】- Comes with 2 years warranty and tool kit, pls reach out to SUNNOW TEAM for prompt assistance. Be certain to factor in both your height and weight when selecting this ergonomic chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant surprise - Awesome customer service !!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m pleasantly surprised with this chair and more yet with the company’s customer support. In a word, amazing!I normally don’t buy chairs from the internet as it is something you should try before you buy to be sure it will be comfortable and practical for you. Since most of my leather chairs end up peeling and teared with time, I decided to try this new one, especially because of the adjustable seat position. I have long legs and it would be great to have better thigh support so I took a leap of faith and went for it knowing that I could return it even with some trouble to repack it.To my surprise the chair arrived, and quality seemed very good. The finish was good, all parts matched ok and was a breeze to assemble (it come even with a spare screw card) and also – almost – comfortable. The issue preventing it to be perfect is that it is a little too high for me even adjusted to their minimum height.Pleased with the quality of the chair and all it’s adjustment but one (height) I wrote to the company, not to complain but to suggest that they increase the range of the height adjustment to make it perfect.To my surprise, the same day, in a matter of hours, I received a message from the company acknowledging the receipt of my suggestion and saying that they do have a shorter column and they would send it to me immediately, free of charge. And they did it… Four days after the new column was delivered to me and I tried to assemble it. Easy said than done as I’m a heavy 6.2 guy and gravity has made impossible to separate the top of the column from the mechanism of the chair.Again I wrote to the company, not to complain, but to suggest that they change the junction of the mechanism to the top column to be held by a screw and bearing to make it possible to change the column if needed. To my surprise – again – they offered to send me a new mechanism to use with the shorter column, free of charge.Since the issue was – since the beginning - not their fault, I said it wouldn’t be fair with the company to bear all the cost, and offered to share the part and shipping and their answer was “Thank you but NO – we are most interested in our customer’s satisfaction”.Impossible not to write a positive review for a company with this customer service. We must praise it hoping that others can mirror them in our benefit.As for the chair, after changing the column, it is great: with all the seat, back and arms adjustment it is easy to find the sweet spot for my height and quality, so far, has been great, everything working well and easy to adjust. Let’s see how it will age, I will do an update in a couple of months regarding how it is wearing off.PS: I do not have any link to the company nor I was compensated in any manner to write this review other than receiving a great customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product backed by excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I'm always skeptical about buying from brands I've never used before. I was pleasantly surprised by this purchase. I've had the chair now about three months. It's held up beautifully. It's a good quality product for the money. It's given me no problems at all. It is comfortable. It doesn't give me any aches and pains like the previous chair did. It rolls smooth and feels stable.It arrived with TWO sets of hardware, which was fantastic. No worrying about missing parts. Assembly was straightforward and simple. I decided to try the lumbar support pillow. The manufacturer sent it right away as they promised they would. The pillow is much better quality than I expected.Bottom line, I would buy this chair again in a heartbeat. I highly recommend it to anyone who spends a lot of time at a desk or in front of a computer. It's given me great support and zero problems.UPDATE: 06/22/22After using it for six months, I bought a second one for my home computer. The first was for my work office. They provided the same great service on the second chair also. Two sets of hardware. Easy to understand instructions. The scond chair took me about 30 minutes to unbox and put together. The box that they ship in is double the thickness of regular boxes. Parts and pieces are wrapped very well. The hardware even comes with a blue dab of thread lock on it to make sure the screws don't back out.Their customer service is what some American companies used to be. They are excellent in every way. Before you get the chair, they send you an email saying it is about to arrive and give you instructions on what to do if there is a problem. They still offer a free lumbar pillow as well. No strings attached! They even send follow-ups, not to sell you anything, but to make sure you are completely satisfied.As you put the chair together, you'll notice that it was manufactured with detail in mind. All the holes line up. Everything works as it should or better. No broken or missing parts. Not even a scratch. I really can't recommend these folks enough! I am STILL completely satisfied after two purchases about six months apart.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am happy I chose this
reviews.reviewText: The best office chair I have ever bought. Came in good time, delivery and set up was perfect. I am glad I made this choice.
